about_the_game:
Decimate hordes of creatures that are thrown your way in the Gambit! Survivor's Gambit is a game where your choice of weapons can be the difference between ripping apart large amounts of creatures or finding yourself overrun with nowhere to go.

With rogue-lite elements, your choice can be between surviving or falling to the Gambit. Find yourself using an arsenal of different weapons and playing various characters along the way as you dive deeper into the Gambit,

After every Mini Boss is killed you will be rewarded, but what will the reward be? that, Survivor, is left to the Gambit to decide.

The more runs you do, the more powerful you will be, leveling up and spending hard-earned gold from destroying masses of enemies, you can spend this gold on permanent upgrades, regardless of the character you decided to enter the Gambit with.

Each level-up you get a selection of upgrades to pick from, these upgrades could be anything from gaining an extra weapon to assist you in eliminating enemies, or a passive item that could perhaps increase your movement speed, or increase your regenerative health over time. 

Destroy torches that are scattered around the Gambit, you could find anything from extra gold, that has been left behind by those that have fallen before you, maybe a trusty Banana that can take you back to good health, or perhaps a Magnetic-Orb that will send all dropped EXP on the floor flying towards you, or The Gambits worst nightmare, the Skull that will evaporate all current enemies alive in the Gambit

Each weapon once it has reached its maxed upgrade and is paired with the correct passive item has a chance to evolve into its powerful counter part, which can be aquired by the Lucky chests dropped by Mini-Boses, try out different builds and combinations and see what chaos you can cause to the Gambit!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3 / AMD FX 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.0, Nvidia GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 5750 / Intel HD 630
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bits
  • Processor: Core i5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: penGL 4.3, Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT / Intel Xe-HPG

short_description: The Gambit is unforgiving, you may find yourself trying to run but soon will discover that the only way to survive is to face the Gambit head-on, FULL STEAM AHEAD! Survivor's Gambit keeps minimalistic gameplay in mind and makes your choices do the talking with rogue-lite elements.
